text: allatu, "itanai avar ittukkattik kontar" enru avarkal kurukinrarkala? Nir kuruviraka"nan itai ittuk kattik kontiruntal, (allah atarkaka tantippane; appotu) allahvitamiruntu enakku erpatum etaiyum (tatukka) ninkal cakti pera mattirkal. Ninkal itaip parri ennenna kurukirirkalo, atai avan nankarikiravan; enakkum enkalukkumitaiye (atu parri) avane potumana catciyaka irukkinran; avan mikavum mannippavan; mikka kirupaiyutaiyavan" enru (napiye! Nir kurum)
